content.rendered:
The main creator of the series is Steven Knight, who has so far demonstrated his skills in films such as Beautiful Dirt or Eastern Promises, this time working on a personal family legend for the brothers. The history of a gallery in the raw world of the past, which once became the ruler of the Birmingham underworld and has retained its reputation in British folklore even after its demise has passed. Out of England’s once flourishing gang culture, Knight has brought an Irish band called Peaky Blinders to the center of the plot, a company that was inspired by gangsters who once lived here (as on the American prelude). More specifically, members of the Shelby clan, who formed a formidable force from the deep quarters of England through their betting offices and the defense money collected.”

Seasons: 6 (2016-2022)

Status: Finished

Creator: Steven Knight

Channel: BBC One BBC Two, Netflix

Starring: Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Sophie Rundle
